In ant VSS optional task, ssdir property is defined as where ss.exe resides.
It works fine as it is defined.
but according to VSS documentation, SSDIR environment variable is used for 
letting VSS to know where the srcsafe.ini is residing.
so this ssdir property is not direct mapping for SSDIR environment variable.
I use now SSDIR environment variable. I want to use this inside ant scripts as 
a property.
this is useful in terms of using different databases with the one installation 
of VSS.
doesnot look like having any such property where i can specify a different 
directory where the srcsafe.ini which has different database than the 
srcsafe.ini which has the default database location mapped.
